text:
How to make ChatGPT create a PowerPoint.

A step-by-step guide:

1 - Go to this GPT: https://lnkd.in/dPVgPeKX.
2 - Click "Start", add a topic & answer questions.
3 - Copy ChatGPT's results & go to gamma.app.
4 - Go to "Create new" > "Paste in text" > paste it.
5 - Select "Preserve this exact text" & generate.
6 - Pick your favorite theme (or make your own).
7 - Choose "AI images" & "GPT image" on the left.
8 - Make sure it's "Card-by-card" at the top.
9 - Click on the final "Generate".

You have an entire PowerPoint that you can edit, with AI images you can (also) edit, made in minutes.

This is what PowerPoint was supposed to be.
